channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lucy Liu Admits She Had a Childhood ‘Crush’ on Actor Who Later Became Her Costar, but Was Too ‘Embarrassed’ to Tell Him
item.description: "He had a very ’80s look, with his hair blown back and his hand in his jeans pocket," she said of her one-time crush
